001package org.galaxyproject.gxformat2.v19_09.utils;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006public class OneOrListOf<T> {
007  private Optional<T> object;
008  private Optional<List<T>> objects;
009
010  private OneOrListOf(final T object, final List<T> objects) {
011    this.object = Optional.ofNullable(object);
012    this.objects = Optional.ofNullable(objects);
013  }
014
015  public static <T> OneOrListOf<T> oneOf(T object) {
016    return new OneOrListOf(object, null);
017  }
018
019  public static <T> OneOrListOf<T> listOf(List<T> objects) {
020    assert objects != null;
021    return new OneOrListOf(null, objects);
022  }
023
024  public boolean isOne() {
025    return this.getOneOptional().isPresent();
026  }
027
028  public boolean isList() {
029    return this.getListOptional().isPresent();
030  }
031
032  public Optional<T> getOneOptional() {
033    return this.object;
034  }
035
036  public Optional<List<T>> getListOptional() {
037    return this.objects;
038  }
039
040  public T getOne() {
041    return this.getOneOptional().get();
042  }
043
044  public List<T> getList() {
045    return this.getListOptional().get();
046  }
047}
